headline: AES Launches Haven Safety AI As New Angle On Earnings Quality
summary: AES (NYSE:AES) has co-launched Haven Safety AI with AI Fund. The partnership introduces an AI native safety investigation platform focused on high risk industries. The move highlights AES's focus on digital tools that support workplace safety and operational decision making. For investors watching NYSE:AES, this development comes at a time when the stock is trading at $16.25, with a 1 year return of 67.9%. Over the past month, the shares show a 13.5% return and a 9.6% return year to date,...
